title: citta dIrccarA (varNa)
sahitya:
citta dIrccarA sItA ramaNa ciru naugala shrngAra rAmA


anupallavi

  pantamElarA nE palumAru nItO bAga moraliDu bhAvameriginAdu


caraNam    dAri teliyaka tappincu ninnu kOri vaccitini kOmaLAngi nAthA
NArinuta padmanAbha nagadharavArijAkSa shrInivAsa vEga nAdu
